text: Isabelle Collin Dufresne (stage name, Ultra Violet; 6 September 1935 – 14 June 2014) was a French-American artist, author, and former colleague and superstar of Andy Warhol. Earlier in her career, she worked for and studied with surrealist artist Salvador Dalí. She lived and worked in New York City, and also had a studio in Nice, France. Dufresne died on 14 June 2014 in New York City from cancer, aged 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official website Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American artists Category:American movie actors Category:Writers from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:French artists Category:French movie actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Grenoble Category:Writers from New York City Category:Andy Warhol
